---
title: "cw-patient-data.ts"
---

## High-level description
This code defines the structure and types for CommonWell patient data in the Metriport API. It includes interfaces for creating and updating CommonWell patient data, as well as types for links and demographic information.

## Code Structure
The code defines several interfaces and types that are used to represent CommonWell patient data:
- `CwLink`: Represents a network link in CommonWell
- `CwData`: Contains links and link demographics history
- `CwPatientDataCreate`: Interface for creating CommonWell patient data
- `CwPatientDataCreatePartial`: Interface for creating partial CommonWell patient data
- `CwPatientData`: Combines `BaseDomain` and `CwPatientDataCreate`

## Symbols

### `CwLink`
#### Description
An alias for the `NetworkLink` type from the CommonWell SDK.

### `CwData`
#### Description
Defines the structure of CommonWell patient data.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| links | CwLink[] | Array of CommonWell network links |
| linkDemographicsHistory | LinkDemographicsHistory (optional) | History of link demographics |

### `CwPatientDataCreate`
#### Description
Interface for creating CommonWell patient data.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| cxId | string | Customer ID |
| data | CwData | CommonWell patient data |

### `CwPatientDataCreatePartial`
#### Description
Interface for creating partial CommonWell patient data.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| cxId | string | Customer ID |
| data | Partial&lt;CwData&gt; | Partial CommonWell patient data |

### `CwPatientData`
#### Description
Combines `BaseDomain` and `CwPatientDataCreate` to represent a complete CommonWell patient data record.

## Dependencies
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| @metriport/core/domain/base-domain | Imports base domain interfaces |
| @metriport/core/domain/patient-demographics | Imports LinkDemographicsHistory type |
| @metriport/commonwell-sdk | Imports NetworkLink type |

This code provides a structured way to handle CommonWell patient data within the Metriport API, allowing for creation, partial creation, and representation of patient data including links and demographic history.
